Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.hairdryer.mil

Class HairDryerCoupledModel

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.hairdryer.mil.HairDryerCoupledModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.CoupledModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, Serializable
public class HairDryerCoupledModel extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.CoupledModel
The class HairDryerCoupledModel defines the DEVS coupled model for a first prototype example of the hair dryer simulator.

Description

This model is only used to perform unit tests on the hair dryer simulation models, hence it is kept to a minimal implementation.

Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariants

Created on : 2021-09-20

Author:
Jacques Malenfant

    • HairDryerCoupledModel

      public HairDryerCoupledModel(String uri, TimeUnit simulatedTimeUnit, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.CoordinatorI simulationEngine, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI[] submodels, Map<Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> imported, Map<Class<? extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventI>,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.ReexportedEvent> reexported, Map<fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSource,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.events.EventSink[]> connections) throws Exception
      creating the coupled model instance.

      Contract

       pre    true        // no more precondition.
 post   true        // no more postcondition.
      Parameters:
      uri - URI of the coupled model to be created.
      simulatedTimeUnit - time unit used in the simulation by the model.
      simulationEngine - simulation engine enacting the model.
      submodels - array of submodels of the new coupled model.
      imported - map from imported event types to submodels consuming them.
      reexported - map from event types exported by submodels that are reexported by this coupled model.
      connections - map connecting event sources to arrays of event sinks among submodels.
      Throws:
      Exception - to do.
